title: sEvE nandanandanam
sahitya:
sEvE nandanandanam satatam


anupallavi

  pAvana yamunA taTa vAsam murahAram


caraNam 1    shItakara sannibha vadanam vidhi cittaja janakam kunda kuDmaLa radanam 
vItamOha hrdaya sadanam parivIta pita vasanam htra sura kadanam
    caraNam 2    durita sEvaka kadanam dyumaNi kalita nEtram pada jita kamalam 
ghOra daitya dahanam amalam nIla kuTila kuNDala rAjimukha mati vimalam
    caraNam 3    nIrada sama rucikaraNam dharaNIbara timira samUhAtigma kiraNam 
nAradAdi munIndra sharaNam padmanAbham akhila lOka tApa pariharaNam
